title: MPs invited to discuss how to overcome current economic crisis
body_lines: Dr.Swarnim Wagle, an international development professional, will address Sri Lankan lawmakers tomorrow at a discussion on how to overcome the current economic crisis.
A discussion has been organised by the  Parliamentary Committee on Public Finance.
Dr. Wagle has served as a Senior Economist at the World Bank and UNDP offices in Hanoi, Colombo, and New York.
